enb_long_title: Expert meeting on methodologies for technology needs assessments
section_title: SESSION FOUR: TECHNOLOGY TRANSFER ACTIVITIES AND INITIATIVES
sentences: On Wednesday afternoon, delegates convened for a session on technology transfer activities and initiatives.

The session began with four presentations on developed countries technology transfer activities in support of UNFCCC Article 4.5, focusing on the assistance provided in acquiring mitigation and adaptation technologies.
Delegates then considered multilateral initiatives and other technical assistance programmes by international organizations.
